businessProfile.name: Pizza Baby!
businessProfile.address: 1631 W Craig Rd Suite 4, North Las Vegas, NV 89032, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 1631 W Craig Rd Suite 4, North Las Vegas, NV 89032, USA

reviews.text:
Update: Nathan reached out and made things right. Came back and ordered again. Pizza was great and correct order this time.   Definitely some of the best pizza around!

Aside from one of my pizzas being incorrect,  this was supposed to be brisket not sausage,  Taste is great. Fries are ridiculously small for the price though. Will only come back for pizza but definitely checking orders next time to be sure its correct.

I was really craving pizza last night and stumbled upon this spot on Google Maps. Without hesitation, I decided to check it out. Right away, I got a nostalgic vibe‚Äîthink classic 80s pizza joint, with lots of tables and a cozy atmosphere. The menu is refreshingly simple, making it easy to decide what to get. They offer four sizes: personal, medium, large, and XL. I went for the XL pepperoni.

The cook took my order and told me it'd be ready in about 10-15 minutes. I want to point out, don‚Äôt let the empty exterior fool you. While waiting, I watched at least six families come in to pick up their orders in that short time, which speaks volumes about their efficiency. The cooks were on it, and I was in and out in a flash.

Now, onto the pizza. The XL was loaded with pepperoni, and I loved the quirky, uneven cut‚Äîit just felt like they didn't overthink it. The dough was soft, all the way from the tip to the crust, with just the right amount of sweetness. The combination of pepperoni and cheese was perfect‚Äîflavorful and satisfying. If you‚Äôre in the area, I highly recommend stopping by. I‚Äôm definitely coming back to try the Detroit-style pizza next time!

Food explorers tend to get excited about a new restaurant. To taste a new sauce, a new dough, enjoy a new atmosphere.
Las Vegas has evolved  among the food chains. An area where pizza parlors are thought of as a dime for a dozen. But like life itself, everyone still gets excited when there is a new baby amongst their circles. Pizza Baby is a definitive example of a thriving family business. One that serves a unique taste among a cluster of pizza parlors. And promotes the value of a business, brouFood explorers tend to get excited about a new restaurant. To taste a new sauce, a new dough, enjoy a new atmosphere.
Las Vegas has evolved  among the food chains. An area where pizza parlors are thought of as a dime for a dozen. But like life itself, everyone still gets excited when there is a new baby amongst their circles. Pizza Baby is a definitive example of a thriving family business. One that serves a unique taste among a cluster of pizza parlors. And promotes the value of a business, brought together by family values.ght together by family values.
Omg! I ordered take out. This pizza was delicious! I could‚Äôve married it!! I‚Äôm surprised at the crazy good deals they have online! That year of pizza deal is definitely worth it!

It's great place for a flavored pizza that leaves you satisfied. Lot of great options yet simple at the same time. Not all the time you get a great place thats chill and full of flavor. Margarita is on point, that was like a ratatouille moment, flashbacks to a time of goodies and yummies. This place ranks high to pizza places, Toppers of Oxnard as number 1 top tier, Angel's Pizza in Dumaguete as 2 second tier, and Pizza Baby has good company with many in this tier of I'm coming back again.

recentReviews.text:
Update: Nathan reached out and made things right. Came back and ordered again. Pizza was great and correct order this time.   Definitely some of the best pizza around!

Aside from one of my pizzas being incorrect,  this was supposed to be brisket not sausage,  Taste is great. Fries are ridiculously small for the price though. Will only come back for pizza but definitely checking orders next time to be sure its correct.

recentReviews.author: Darr Wood
recentReviews.text: It's great place for a flavored pizza that leaves you satisfied. Lot of great options yet simple at the same time. Not all the time you get a great place thats chill and full of flavor. Margarita is on point, that was like a ratatouille moment, flashbacks to a time of goodies and yummies. This place ranks high to pizza places, Toppers of Oxnard as number 1 top tier, Angel's Pizza in Dumaguete as 2 second tier, and Pizza Baby has good company with many in this tier of I'm coming back again.

recentReviews.author: Felix L
recentReviews.text:
I was really craving pizza last night and stumbled upon this spot on Google Maps. Without hesitation, I decided to check it out. Right away, I got a nostalgic vibe‚Äîthink classic 80s pizza joint, with lots of tables and a cozy atmosphere. The menu is refreshingly simple, making it easy to decide what to get. They offer four sizes: personal, medium, large, and XL. I went for the XL pepperoni.

The cook took my order and told me it'd be ready in about 10-15 minutes. I want to point out, don‚Äôt let the empty exterior fool you. While waiting, I watched at least six families come in to pick up their orders in that short time, which speaks volumes about their efficiency. The cooks were on it, and I was in and out in a flash.

Now, onto the pizza. The XL was loaded with pepperoni, and I loved the quirky, uneven cut‚Äîit just felt like they didn't overthink it. The dough was soft, all the way from the tip to the crust, with just the right amount of sweetness. The combination of pepperoni and cheese was perfect‚Äîflavorful and satisfying. If you‚Äôre in the area, I highly recommend stopping by. I‚Äôm definitely coming back to try the Detroit-style pizza next time!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 5 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers appreciate the nostalgic, cozy atmosphere reminiscent of a classic 80s pizza joint, which enhances their dining experience. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The pizza is praised for its unique taste and quality, with a soft dough and perfect combination of toppings, making it stand out among other pizza parlors. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
Customers are impressed by the efficiency and speed of service, with orders ready in 10-15 minutes, even during busy times. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness - social media marketing can improve this area
Poor online visibility - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
Competition/discovery issues - social media marketing can improve this area
